fullplot: A young man living in Los Angeles has been estranged from his wealthy New York family for years. One day, he suddenly receives word that his terminally ill father wishes to be taken off life support and has 36 hours to live. When he agrees to visit his father, he unintentionally sets up a family conflict with no easy resolution.
plot: A man estranged from his family receives word that his father has chosen to take himself off life support within forty-eight hours.
title: Lullaby
